commentBody: Being in the Navy I know of NAPS and I want Navy to beat Army forever and ever.  I think, too, even those of us in the Navy who didn't attend the Academy have a special place in our hearts for that institution, more so than the other services have for their schools.  Other, more negative, comments aside -- many with which I agree -- I think Mr Nocera provided an interesting insight to this particular slice of college athletics.  Mr Peter Banos' experience notwithstanding, I have spoken with some NAPS students, in the past, and they all had expressed very positive experiences of the institution.  From experience, I can say that USNA graduates are some of the finest individuals with whom I've worked in either the public or private sectors.
